languages.text: Фактор прибыли — показатель статуса, богатства и власти {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольного Торговца{/g}. Он определяется деловыми связями, доходами от владений и объемом казны. Значение фактора прибыли можно посмотреть на вкладке репутации в меню персонажа [{bind|OpenCharacterScreen}]. В путешествиях ваш персонаж будет использовать фактор прибыли для всех приобретений и выполнения колониальных проектов. Фактор прибыли не расходуется во время покупок — его показатель определяет возможность совершить торговую сделку. Фактор прибыли может расти или уменьшаться: в основном на его рост влияют крупные финансовые сделки, а на падение — вложения в колониальные проекты.
languages.original_text: Profit factor is a measure of your status, wealth, and power as a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}. Its value is determined by your trade connections, income of your holdings, and treasury reserves. The value of your profit factor is displayed on the reputation tab in the character menu [{bind|OpenCharacterScreen}]. While travelling, your character will use profit factor for buying items and completing colonial projects. Profit factor is not spent on purchases and transactions — instead, its level determines your ability to conclude trade transactions. Profit factor can grow or diminish. Its growth is primarily influenced by major trade deals, and its decrease by investments in colonial projects.

traits.locale_text:
Фактор прибыли — показатель статуса, богатства и власти {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольного Торговца{/g}. Он определяется деловыми связями, доходами ваших владений, объемом казны, ссуд и займов.
В путешествиях ваш персонаж будет использовать фактор прибыли для всех приобретений — от гранат и оружия до планетарных колоний.
Фактор прибыли не расходуется во время покупок и сделок. Его показатель определяет возможность совершить торговую сделку или пройти некоторые проверки.

Фактор прибыли — показатель статуса, богатства и власти {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольного Торговца{/g}. Он определяется деловыми связями, доходами ваших владений, объемом казны, ссуд и займов.
В путешествиях ваш персонаж будет использовать фактор прибыли для всех приобретений — от гранат и оружия до планетарных колоний.
Фактор прибыли не расходуется во время покупок и сделок. Его показатель определяет возможность совершить торговую сделку или пройти некоторые проверки.

languages.text: Profit factor is a measure of your status, wealth, and power as a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}. Its value is determined by your trade connections, income of your holdings, and treasury reserves. The value of your profit factor is displayed on the reputation tab in the character menu [{bind|OpenCharacterScreen}]. While travelling, your character will use profit factor for buying items and completing colonial projects. Profit factor is not spent on purchases and transactions — instead, its level determines your ability to conclude trade transactions. Profit factor can grow or diminish. Its growth is primarily influenced by major trade deals, and its decrease by investments in colonial projects.
languages.original_text: Фактор прибыли — показатель статуса, богатства и власти {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольного Торговца{/g}. Он определяется деловыми связями, доходами от владений и объемом казны. Значение фактора прибыли можно посмотреть на вкладке репутации в меню персонажа [{bind|OpenCharacterScreen}]. В путешествиях ваш персонаж будет использовать фактор прибыли для всех приобретений и выполнения колониальных проектов. Фактор прибыли не расходуется во время покупок — его показатель определяет возможность совершить торговую сделку. Фактор прибыли может расти или уменьшаться: в основном на его рост влияют крупные финансовые сделки, а на падение — вложения в колониальные проекты.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactor}Profit factor{/g} is a measure of your status, wealth, and power as a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}. Its value is determined by your trade connections, income of your holdings, treasury, and loans both to and from you. The value of your profit factor is displayed in the bottom right corner of the inventory screen [{bind|OpenInventory}]. While travelling, your character will use profit factor for buying items and completing colonial projects. Profit factor is not spent on purchases and transactions — instead, its level determines your ability to make a trade deal. Profit factor can grow or diminish. Its growth is primarily influenced by major trade deals, and its decrease by investments in colonial projects.

{g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactor}Profit factor{/g} is a measure of your status, wealth, and power as a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}. Its value is determined by your trade connections, income of your holdings, treasury, and loans both to and from you. The value of your profit factor is displayed in the bottom right corner of the inventory screen [{bind|OpenInventory}]. While travelling, your character will use profit factor for buying items and completing colonial projects. Profit factor is not spent on purchases and transactions — instead, its level determines your {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} to conclude trade transactions. Profit factor can grow or diminish. Its growth is primarily influenced by major trade deals, and its decrease by investments in colonial projects.

{g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactor}Profit factor{/g} is a measure of your status, wealth, and power as a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}. Its value is determined by your trade connections, income of your holdings, treasury, and loans both to and from you. The value of your profit factor is displayed in the bottom right corner of the inventory screen [{bind|OpenInventory}]. While travelling, your character will use profit factor for buying items and completing colonial projects. Profit factor is not spent on purchases and transactions — instead, its level determines your ability to make a trade deal. Profit factor can grow or diminish. Its growth is primarily influenced by major trade deals, and its decrease by investments in colonial projects.

{g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactor}Profit factor{/g} is a measure of your status, wealth, and power as a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}. Its value is determined by your trade connections, income of your holdings, treasury, and loans both to and from you. While travelling, your character will use profit factor for buying items and completing colonial projects. Profit factor is not spent on purchases and transactions — instead, its level determines your ability to conclude trade transactions. Profit factor can grow or diminish. Its growth is primarily influenced by major trade deals, and its decrease by investments in colonial projects.

{g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactor}Profit factor{/g} is a measure of your status, wealth, and power as a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}. Its value is determined by your trade connections, income of your holdings, treasury, and loans both to and from you. The value of your profit factor is displayed on the reputation tab in the character menu [{bind|OpenInventory}]. While travelling, your character will use profit factor for buying items and completing colonial projects. Profit factor is not spent on purchases and transactions — instead, its level determines your {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} to conclude trade transactions. Profit factor can grow or diminish. Its growth is primarily influenced by major trade deals, and its decrease by investments in colonial projects.

languages.text: 利润因子代表您身为{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}的地位、财富与权力。利润因子取决于您的贸易关系、持有物品的收入、国库财富等等。您当前的利润因子显示在角色菜单 [{bind|OpenCharacterScreen}] 的“声望”标签页。 在旅行的过程中，您的角色会使用利润因子来购买物品，完成殖民地项目。 利润因子并不会直接用来购买物品或进行交易，而是会决定您进行交易的相关能力。利润因子可能会增加，也可能会降低。成功的重要贸易会让您的利润因子提高，而殖民地项目的相关投资则会让利润因子降低。
languages.original_text: Profit factor is a measure of your status, wealth, and power as a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}. Its value is determined by your trade connections, income of your holdings, and treasury reserves. The value of your profit factor is displayed on the reputation tab in the character menu [{bind|OpenCharacterScreen}]. While travelling, your character will use profit factor for buying items and completing colonial projects. Profit factor is not spent on purchases and transactions — instead, its level determines your ability to conclude trade transactions. Profit factor can grow or diminish. Its growth is primarily influenced by major trade deals, and its decrease by investments in colonial projects.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactor}利润因子{/g}代表您身为{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}的地位、财富与权力。利润因子取决于您的贸易关系、持有物品的收入、国库财富等等。您当前的利润因子显示在角色菜单 [{bind|OpenCharacterScreen}] 的“声望”标签页。 在旅行的过程中，您的角色会使用利润因子来购买物品，完成殖民地项目。 利润因子并不会直接用来购买物品或进行交易，而是会决定您进行交易的相关能力。利润因子可能会增加，也可能会降低。成功的重要贸易会让您的利润因子提高，而殖民地项目的相关投资则会让利润因子降低。

{g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactor}利润因子{/g}代表您身为{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}的地位、财富与权力。利润因子取决于您的贸易关系、持有物品的收入、国库财富，以及借贷关系等等。您当前的利润因子显示在角色菜单 [{bind|OpenInventory}] 的“声望”标签页。 在旅行的过程中，您的角色会使用利润因子来购买物品，完成殖民地项目。 利润因子并不会直接用来购买物品或进行交易，而是会决定您进行交易的相关{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}{/g}能力。利润因子可能会增加，也可能会降低。成功的重要贸易会让您的利润因子提高，而殖民地项目的相关投资则会让利润因子降低。

languages.text: 利益因子は、{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}としてのあなたの地位、富、力を示す尺度だ。その価値は、取引関係、拠点の収入、国庫によって決定される。利益因子の価値は、キャラクターメニュー [{bind|OpenCharacterScreen}] の評価インベントリ画面タブに表示される。 旅の中で、キャラクターはアイテムの購入やコロニープロジェクトの完了に利益因子を使用する。 利益因子は購入や取引に使用されるのではなく、そのレベルによって貿易取引を行うアビリティがあるかどうかが決まる。利益因子は伸びることもあれば下がることもある。主に主要取引のおかげで伸びて、コロニープロジェクトへ投資すると下がる。
languages.original_text: Profit factor is a measure of your status, wealth, and power as a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}. Its value is determined by your trade connections, income of your holdings, and treasury reserves. The value of your profit factor is displayed on the reputation tab in the character menu [{bind|OpenCharacterScreen}]. While travelling, your character will use profit factor for buying items and completing colonial projects. Profit factor is not spent on purchases and transactions — instead, its level determines your ability to conclude trade transactions. Profit factor can grow or diminish. Its growth is primarily influenced by major trade deals, and its decrease by investments in colonial projects.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactor}利益因子{/g}は、{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}としてのあなたの地位、富、力を示す尺度だ。その価値は、取引関係、拠点の収入、国庫によって決定される。利益因子の価値は、キャラクターメニュー [{bind|OpenCharacterScreen}] の評価インベントリ画面タブに表示される。 旅の中で、キャラクターはアイテムの購入やコロニープロジェクトの完了に利益因子を使用する。 利益因子は購入や取引に使用されるのではなく、そのレベルによって貿易取引を行うアビリティがあるかどうかが決まる。利益因子は伸びることもあれば下がることもある。主に主要取引のおかげで伸びて、コロニープロジェクトへ投資すると下がる。

languages.text: El factor de beneficiocuantifica tu estatus, riquezas y poder como {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g}. Su valor viene dado por tus conexiones comerciales, los ingresos de tus propiedades y la tesorería. El valor de tu factor de beneficio se muestra en la pestaña de reputación del menú de personaje [{bind|OpenCharacterScreen}]. En tus aventuras, el personaje se servirá del factor de beneficio para comprar objetos y completar proyectos coloniales. El factor de beneficio no se consume al realizar compras o transacciones, sino que su nivel determina tu capacidad de realizar transacciones comerciales. El factor de beneficio puede verse incrementado o reducido. Su incremento suele deberse a acuerdos comerciales importantes y su reducción, a inversiones en proyectos coloniales.
languages.original_text: Profit factor is a measure of your status, wealth, and power as a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}. Its value is determined by your trade connections, income of your holdings, and treasury reserves. The value of your profit factor is displayed on the reputation tab in the character menu [{bind|OpenCharacterScreen}]. While travelling, your character will use profit factor for buying items and completing colonial projects. Profit factor is not spent on purchases and transactions — instead, its level determines your ability to conclude trade transactions. Profit factor can grow or diminish. Its growth is primarily influenced by major trade deals, and its decrease by investments in colonial projects.

traits.locale_text: El {g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactor}factor de beneficio{/g} cuantifica tu estatus, riquezas y poder como {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g}. Su valor viene dado por tus conexiones comerciales, los ingresos de tus propiedades y la tesorería. El valor de tu factor de beneficio se muestra en la pestaña de reputación del menú de personaje [{bind|OpenCharacterScreen}]. En tus aventuras, el personaje se servirá del factor de beneficio para comprar objetos y completar proyectos coloniales. El factor de beneficio no se consume al realizar compras o transacciones, sino que su nivel determina tu capacidad de realizar transacciones comerciales. El factor de beneficio puede verse incrementado o reducido. Su incremento suele deberse a acuerdos comerciales importantes y su reducción, a inversiones en proyectos coloniales.

languages.text: Dein Profitfaktor misst deinen Status, deinen Wohlstand und deine Macht als {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Freihändler{/g}. Der Wert basiert auf deinen Handelsverbindungen, den Einkünften deiner Unternehmen und deiner Schatzkammerreserven. Der Wert deines Profitfaktors wird auf dem Ansehen-Register des Charakter-Menüs angezeigt, das du mit [{bind|OpenCharacterScreen}] aufrufen kannst. Auf Reisen nutzt dein Charakter den Profitfaktor für den Kauf von Objekten und den Abschluss von Kolonialprojekten. Der Profitfaktor wird durch Käufe und Transaktionen nicht verringert ... seine Stufe bestimmt vielmehr deine Fähigkeit, Geschäfte abzuschließen. Der Profitfaktor kann steigen oder sinken. Das Wachstum basiert primär auf Handelsgeschäften. Investitionen in Kolonialprojekte senken den Wert.
languages.original_text: Profit factor is a measure of your status, wealth, and power as a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}. Its value is determined by your trade connections, income of your holdings, and treasury reserves. The value of your profit factor is displayed on the reputation tab in the character menu [{bind|OpenCharacterScreen}]. While travelling, your character will use profit factor for buying items and completing colonial projects. Profit factor is not spent on purchases and transactions — instead, its level determines your ability to conclude trade transactions. Profit factor can grow or diminish. Its growth is primarily influenced by major trade deals, and its decrease by investments in colonial projects.

traits.locale_text: Dein {g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactorFullGlossary}Profitfaktor{/g} misst deinen Status, deinen Wohlstand und deine Macht als {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Freihändler{/g}. Der Wert basiert auf deinen Handelsverbindungen, den Einkünften deiner Unternehmen und deiner Schatzkammerreserven. Der Wert deines Profitfaktors wird auf dem Ansehen-Register des Charakter-Menüs angezeigt, das du mit {console_bind|RightBottom} aufrufen kannst. Auf Reisen nutzt dein Charakter den Profitfaktor für den Kauf von Objekten und den Abschluss von Kolonialprojekten. Der Profitfaktor wird durch Käufe und Transaktionen nicht verringert ... seine Stufe bestimmt vielmehr deine Fähigkeit, Geschäfte abzuschließen. Der Profitfaktor kann steigen oder sinken. Das Wachstum basiert primär auf Handelsgeschäften. Investitionen in Kolonialprojekte senken den Wert.

Der {g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactor}Profitfaktor{/g} ist ein Maß für deinen Status, deinen Reichtum und deine Macht als {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Freihändler{/g}. Sein Wert wird durch deine Handelsbeziehungen, die Einnahmen deiner Betriebe, deine Schatzkammer und die Darlehen an dich und von dir bestimmt. Der Wert deines Profitfaktors wird in der unteren rechten Ecke des Inventarbildschirms [{bind|OpenInventory}] angezeigt. Auf Reisen verwendet deine Spielfigur den Profitfaktor, um Gegenstände zu kaufen und Kolonialprojekte zu vollenden. Der Profitfaktor wird nicht für Käufe und Transaktionen ausgegeben — stattdessen bestimmt seine Höhe deine {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g}, Handelsgeschäfte abzuschließen. Der Profitfaktor kann steigen oder sinken. Sein Wachstum wird in erster Linie durch große Handelsgeschäfte beeinflusst, sein Rückgang durch Investitionen in koloniale Projekte.

Der {g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactor}Profitfaktor{/g} misst deinen Status, deinen Wohlstand und deine Macht als {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Freihändler{/g}. Der Wert basiert auf deinen Handelsverbindungen, den Einkünften deiner Unternehmen, deiner Schatzkammer und deinen Ein- und Ausgaben. Der Wert deines Profitfaktors wird auf dem Ansehen-Register des Charakter-Menüs angezeigt [{bind|OpenInventory}]. Auf Reisen nutzt dein Charakter den Profitfaktor für den Kauf von Objekten und den Abschluss von Kolonialprojekten. Der Profitfaktor wird durch Käufe und Transaktionen nicht verringert ... seine Stufe bestimmt vielmehr deine {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g}, Transaktionen abzuschließen. Der Profitfaktor kann steigen oder sinken. Das Wachstum basiert primär auf Handelsgeschäften. Investitionen in Kolonialprojekte senken den Wert.

languages.text: Le facteur d'influencepermet de mesurer votre statut, votre richesse et votre puissance en tant que {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}libre-marchand{/g}. Sa valeur est déterminée par vos relations commerciales, les revenus de vos propriétés et votre trésorerie. La valeur de votre facteur d'influence s'affiche dans l'onglet Réputation du menu de personnage [{bind|OpenCharacterScreen}]. Lors de ses voyages, votre personnage utilisera le facteur d'influence pour acheter des objets et mener à bien des projets coloniaux. Le facteur d'influence n'est pas utilisé pour les achats et les transactions. Son niveau détermine votre capacité à conclure des transactions commerciales. Le facteur d'influence peut augmenter ou diminuer. Son augmentation repose principalement sur les grands accords commerciaux, et sa diminution sur les investissements liés aux projets coloniaux.
languages.original_text: Profit factor is a measure of your status, wealth, and power as a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}. Its value is determined by your trade connections, income of your holdings, and treasury reserves. The value of your profit factor is displayed on the reputation tab in the character menu [{bind|OpenCharacterScreen}]. While travelling, your character will use profit factor for buying items and completing colonial projects. Profit factor is not spent on purchases and transactions — instead, its level determines your ability to conclude trade transactions. Profit factor can grow or diminish. Its growth is primarily influenced by major trade deals, and its decrease by investments in colonial projects.

traits.locale_text: Le {g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactor}facteur d'influence{/g} permet de mesurer votre statut, votre richesse et votre puissance en tant que {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}libre-marchand{/g}. Sa valeur est déterminée par vos relations commerciales, les revenus de vos propriétés et votre trésorerie. La valeur de votre facteur d'influence s'affiche dans l'onglet Réputation du menu de personnage [{bind|OpenCharacterScreen}]. Lors de ses voyages, votre personnage utilisera le facteur d'influence pour acheter des objets et mener à bien des projets coloniaux. Le facteur d'influence n'est pas utilisé pour les achats et les transactions. Son niveau détermine votre {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} à conclure des transactions commerciales. Le facteur d'influence peut augmenter ou diminuer. Son augmentation repose principalement sur les grands accords commerciaux, et sa diminution sur les investissements liés aux projets coloniaux.

Le {g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactor}facteur de profit{/g} permet de mesurer votre statut, votre richesse et votre puissance en tant que {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Libre-Marchand{/g}. Sa valeur est déterminée par vos relations commerciales, les revenus de vos propriétés, votre trésorerie et vos prêts/emprunts. La valeur de votre facteur de profit est affichée en bas à droite de l'écran d'inventaire [{bind|OpenInventory}]. Lors de ses voyages, votre personnage utilisera le facteur de profit pour acheter des objets et mener à bien des projets coloniaux. Le facteur de profit n'est pas utilisé pour les achats et les transactions. Son niveau détermine votre {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} à conclure des transactions commerciales. Le facteur de profit peut augmenter ou diminuer. Son augmentation repose principalement sur les accords commerciaux majeurs, et sa diminution sur les investissements liés aux projets coloniaux.

languages.text: Kâr faktörü; {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g} olarak sahip olduğun statü, servet ve gücün bir ölçüsüdür. Değeri; ticari bağlantıların, varlıklarının sağladığı gelir ve hazine rezervlerine göre belirlenir. Kâr faktörü değerin, karakter menüsündeki [{bind|OpenCharacterScreen}] itibar sekmesinde görüntülenir. Karakterin, seyahat ederken eşya satın almak ve koloni projelerini tamamlamak için kâr faktörünü kullanır. Kâr faktörü, ticari işlemlerde kullanılan bir harcama birimi değildir. Seviyesi, ticari işlem yapabilme kabiliyetini belirler. Kâr faktörü yükselebilir veya düşebilir. Yükselmesinde esasen büyük ticari anlaşmalar rol oynarken, düşmesinde ise koloni projelerine yapılan yatırımlar etkili olur.
languages.original_text: Profit factor is a measure of your status, wealth, and power as a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}. Its value is determined by your trade connections, income of your holdings, and treasury reserves. The value of your profit factor is displayed on the reputation tab in the character menu [{bind|OpenCharacterScreen}]. While travelling, your character will use profit factor for buying items and completing colonial projects. Profit factor is not spent on purchases and transactions — instead, its level determines your ability to conclude trade transactions. Profit factor can grow or diminish. Its growth is primarily influenced by major trade deals, and its decrease by investments in colonial projects.
